ce:sections.ce:para:
The authors regret the errors in the below sections. The authors would like to apologize for any inconvenience caused.
1.
The following sentence “The remainder of this paper is structured as follows: Section 2 provides a brief contextual background, as well as developing the hypothesis of the paper” contained in Section 1 of the paper should be corrected as follows “The remainder of this paper is structured as follows: Section 2 provides a brief contextual background, as well as developing the hypotheses of the paper” thus changing hypothesis with hypotheses.
2.
Current title of section “2. Literature review and hypothesis development” should be corrected with “2. Literature review and hypotheses development” thus changing hypothesis with hypotheses.
3.
The title of section “2.2 Theoretical underpinning and hypothesis development: legitimacy theory” should be corrected as follows “2.2 Theoretical underpinning and hypotheses development: legitimacy theory” thus correcting hypothesis with hypotheses.
4.
The baseline regression model equations listed in section 3.3 of the paper are:

5.
Table 7 was presented differently on the final pdf for review. Table 7 is currently shown as:
Unlabelled Image

However, SDGaggregate and estimate (p value) were originally positioned as follows:
Unlabelled Image

Therefore, SDGaggregate and Estimate (p value) should be centered.
6.
Table 11 was initially accurately depicted in the review pdf, however, the current published version of Table 11 is the following
Unlabelled Image
whereas, the “One-to-One PSM” is meant to remain centered as shown in the submitted article shown below:
